dispatch_points_and_get_area_color module¶

Created on Sat Jun 19 21:56:02 2021

@author: leobu

dispatch_points_and_get_area_color.area_data_dict_creation(point_coordsList, traffic_Status, areas_names, area_coordinates)[source]¶

Creates a dictionary to gather all the data

Parameters

  • point_coordsList (list) – The list of (lon, lat) for all the data points.

  • traffic_Status (list) – The list of (str) traffic status values for each point.

  • areas_names (list) – The list of (str) names for each area.

  • area_coordinates (list) – The list of (lon, lat) values for every area.

Returns

Dictionary with every name as keys and for each name a second dictionary with every traffic status and the points associated.

Return type

dict

dispatch_points_and_get_area_color.calcul_area_color_and_grade(dictionary, areas_names)[source]¶

Calcul the color of an area based on all the points in it

Parameters

  • dictionary (dict) – The dictionary generated by the function ‘area_data_dict_creation’.

  • areas_names (list) – The list of (str) names for each area.

Returns

a list of colors, in the order of the areas names list.

Return type

list

dispatch_points_and_get_area_color.is_point_in_poly(coord_point, coord_polygon)[source]¶

Check if a point is inside a polygon

Parameters

  • coord_point (tuple) – A tuple with (lon, lat) values.

  • coord_polygon (list) – The list of (lon, lat) values of a polygon.

Returns

True if the point is inside the polygon, False otherwise

Return type

bool

dispatch_points_and_get_area_color.traffic_points_map(coordList, color, myMap, display_points)[source]¶

Allow the user to choose to display or not the data points on the map

Parameters

  • coordList (list) – The list of (lon, lat) for all the data points.

  • color (str) – The color we want for the points.

  • myMap (folium.folium.map) – The folium map

  • display_points (bool) – True if the user checked yes on the web page or False otherwise

Returns

Nothing, just display (or not) the points directly on the map using folium
